extensionDescription.message: Removes / closes duplicate tabs, replacing it with a matching existing tab.

autosaveNotice.message: Changes to settings are automatically saved.
autosaveNotice.description: Permanent notice in the options screen.

protectDuplicatesLabel.description: Option label in the options screen.

protectDuplicatesHint.message: Tabs created by the "$DUPLICATETABACTION$" option will not be automatically removed.
protectDuplicatesHint.description: Help under option in the options screen.

moveOrderLabel.description: Option label in the options screen.

moveOrderHint.message: Old tabs will be moved to the current tab position.
moveOrderHint.description: Help under option in the options screen.

checkMultiwindowLabel.description: Option label in the options screen.

checkMultiwindowHint.message: Duplicates are checked across all (non-private) windows.
checkMultiwindowHint.description: Help under option in the options screen.

notificationTitle.description: Notification title shown when closing a duplicated tab.

enableWhitelistLabel.description: Option label for enabling whitelist feature.

enableWhitelistHint.message: Whitelisted domains and URLs will not be deduplicated.

addDomain.description: Button text to add domain to whitelist.

addUrl.description: Button text to add URL to whitelist.

remove.description: Button text to remove item from whitelist.

invalidUrl.description: Error message for invalid URL input.

whitelistDomain.description: Context menu item to whitelist domain.

whitelistExactUrl.description: Context menu item to whitelist exact URL.

removeFromWhitelist.description: Context menu item to remove from whitelist.

openWhitelistSettings.description: Context menu item to open whitelist settings.

whitelistAddedTitle.description: Notification title when item added to whitelist.

whitelistDomainAdded.description: Notification message when domain added to whitelist.

whitelistUrlAdded.description: Notification message when URL added to whitelist.

whitelistRemovedTitle.description: Notification title when item removed from whitelist.

whitelistRemoved.description: Notification message when item removed from whitelist.

enableWhitelistToggle.description: Context menu item to toggle whitelist on/off.

whitelistToggleTitle.description: Notification title when whitelist is toggled.

whitelistEnabled.description: Notification message when whitelist is enabled.

whitelistDisabled.description: Notification message when whitelist is disabled.

removeFromWhitelistDomain.description: Context menu item to remove domain from whitelist.

removeFromWhitelistUrl.description: Context menu item to remove URL from whitelist.

removeFromWhitelistBoth.description: Context menu item to remove both domain and URL from whitelist.

whitelistRemovedItems.description: Notification message when specific items removed from whitelist.
